about_the_game:
Grim Pastures is a social deduction, multiplayer survival game set in a nostalgic 1970s farm environment. In this game, each player embodies a seasonal worker, but there is a threat on the farm: a serial killer is secretly hidden among the villagers and aims to sabotage the production process.

Each player has unique abilities; some are agile and fast, others have leadership skills, while some are specialized in farming and animal husbandry. When the game begins, the killer is secretly chosen, and players must rely on one another. While the killer tries to sabotage the villagers' work, the villagers must trust each other to survive and complete the tasks on the farm.

The tasks on the farm include producing essential resources such as vegetables, fruits, meat, dairy products, wood, and hay. Time is limited, and each task must be completed within its time frame. However, this process is threatened by the killer's sabotage. The killer can destroy production areas, block workers, or distract them, making it difficult for the villagers to finish their tasks. The villagers' only goal is to complete production on time and maintain order on the farm while protecting themselves from the killer.

In Grim Pastures, survival is not only about completing tasks; it also involves strategizing, teamwork, and not trusting anyone. Which villager is an ally, and which one is an enemy? No one can be sure. This makes every moment filled with tension and excitement. Everyone must rely on their guesses and observations.

In this game, you'll experience a thrilling journey where survival requires not only completing the farm's production but also protecting each other. Grim Pastures is a challenge that demands patience, attention, and perfect timing. In the end, who will survive? A surprise-filled experience awaits you and your team!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 / Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX 580

short_description: Welcome to Grim Pastures! Rumors of a killer infiltrating the farm have shaken the town. Seasonal workers, unable to trust anyone, suspect their coworkers. With tension everywhere and danger lurking, survival means more than completing tasks—it’s about staying alive.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Bulgarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Hungarian, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
